sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均可表示"行李"之意。
means: baggage ： 不可数名词，在英语指大而重的行李，在美国泛指一切行李。
luggage ： 多用于英语，指旅行者的行李。

sentence.Network_en: He waited until all the luggage was cleared, but Paula's never appeared.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直等到所有的行李都拿走了，但始终没看见葆拉的。

sentence.Network_en: They checked in their luggage and found seats in the departure lounge.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们办完行李托运，到候机室找了座位坐下。

sentence.Network_en: My rucksack was too big for the luggage rack.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的背包太大了，行李架上放不下。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally denoting inconveniently heavy baggage): from lug + -age

entry.def: Luggage is the suitcases and bags that you take with you when travel.

example.ex: Leave your luggage in the hotel...
Each passenger was allowed two 30-kg pieces of luggage.
example.tran: 每位乘客可带两件30公斤的行李。

means.word_mean: 1. a case used to carry belongings when traveling

auth_sentence.content: His luggage turned up days later in Johannesburg.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

Sentence.sentence: M : sorry to have kept you waiting ,Madam , I've located your luggage, it was left behind in Paris and won't arrive until later this evening W : oh ,I can't believe this ,have it been to delivered to my hotel then ,I guess Q :what happened to the woman's luggage
Now it seems that a hand gun was found in your luggage

sentences.en: I've put your luggage on the train.
sentences.cn: 我已把你的行李搬上火车了。

jushi.english: How many pieces of luggage have you got?
I've put your luggage on the train.
jushi.chinese: 我已把你的行李搬上火车了。
